SectionHero.subTitle: Find & book flexible spaces on demand. Simplify space rental with HotPatch.
SectionHero.title: Make Space Work For You
SectionHowItWorks.createListingLink: PS. You can also become a HotPatch host in just a few clicks!
SectionHowItWorks.part1UserText: Browse and apply filters to locate a perfect new spot.
SectionHowItWorks.part1HostText: Follow our simple steps and list your Patch in no time.
SectionHowItWorks.part2UserText: Ask the host questions if you need to and make sure everything is in order before your booking starts.
SectionHowItWorks.part2HostText: Review the request to ensure everything is in order before accepting.
SectionHowItWorks.part3UserText: Review and confirm your booking and make payment.

SectionNewsletter.title: Newsletter Sign Up
SectionNewsletter.text: To find out the latest about our newest Patches, industry news, and all things #makespacework, sign up to our newsletter today.
SectionPatchCategories.title: Patch Categories
SectionTestimonials.title: What Our Users Say
SectionTestimonials.quote1: Very friendly, professional and a brilliant nail technician. She arrived on time and did a fantastic job with her clients. It was a pleasure working with you.
SectionTestimonials.quote2: We had an awesome experience. The space is in a brilliant location and super easy to find in Shoreditch. Our whole workshop had such a great time, with good food and great vibes.
SectionTestimonials.quote3: Great experience renting a table, she was very helpful and friendly, and would definitely work with again!
SectionTestimonials.quote4: Incredibly professional and very welcoming. I rented a chair for 2 days and the space was exactly what we needed. Highly recommend if you need a salon space!
SectionTestimonials.quote5: Using HotPatch I was able to get a studio to hire within budget in such short notice! Absolute Stars! The host approved my booking immediately and we would definitely use this platform & space again.
SectionTestimonials.quote6: Fantastic, unique space in Central London. Host was terrific and the HotPatch team are beyond helpful.
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.title: What is HotPatch?
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.text1: Say goodbye to the hassle of traditional space rental and hello to flexible, on-demand spaces with HotPatch.
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.text2: HotPatch connects businesses and individuals with top-quality spaces for any purpose. Whether you’re in need of a studio for a photo shoot, looking for a space to bring your beauty work to life or seeking a Patch to run events and workshops, HotPatch has got you covered.
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.text3: With HotPatch, finding and renting your perfect space has never been easier. Simply search for a Patch in your desired location, book your space in a matter of minutes, and manage your rental with ease. Plus, with such a wide range of spaces at your fingertips, you can rent a Patch that works for you without breaking the bank.
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.text4: Maybe you’re a fitness professional or a hairdresser? Maybe you are a tattoo artist or beautician? Perhaps a business owner who wants to make the most of their awesome space?
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.text6: Forget empty and underused workspaces. Forget hours wasted searching for the ideal Patch to work from. It’s time to Make Space Work!
SectionWhatIsHotpatch.text7: If you have any questions about how to Make Space Work then head over to our FAQ, or reach out to the HotPatch team at hello@hotpatch.com.
